subject: Check this gross sh..out, no wonder God is so angry with the frickin world!

Don't really know how true this stuff is people, but if it is, then God  
help us.  The guy telling this seems a reliable source too, some need to  send 
this to the company's.  
 
_http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pf9MPhzgaSc_ 
(http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pf9MPhzgaSc)  
 
and the company's: _http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XH_OiRmSsd8_ 
(http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XH_OiRmSsd8)    this is horrible!  I will not buy, 
Pepsi, Kraft, or Nestle's again, until  they fix things, this is terrible!
